body:
The weekend of the 19th would be hard for me, but who knows if I will even be able to make it?

Randolph M. Fritz
Luma
206.596.8625 d

-----Original Message-----
Sent: Friday, November 07, 2014 12:26 PM
To: Radiance general discussion
Dear List,

We're in the early stages of planning next year's workshop, which will be held at the Penn State University's Naval Yard facility in Philadelphia, PA.  We are currently considering dates in the late August/September time frame.

If you are thinking of going and might be able to make it one time but not another, please make yourself heard at this time.  Also, if anyone is aware of competing or complimentary conferences during this period, that would be helpful.

Cheers,
-Greg
_______________________________________________
Radiance-general mailing list
Radiance-general at radiance-online.org
http://www.radiance-online.org/mailman/listinfo/radiance-general
subject: [Radiance-general] 2015 Workshop date poll
